competitors.name: Check Point Software
competitors.notes: Key player in cybersecurity since 1997, established firewall vendor

competitors.name: Cisco Systems
competitors.notes: Major networking and security equipment provider with robust firewall solutions

competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: Established network security player offering enterprise firewall solutions

context: Palo Alto Networks was founded in 2005 by security veteran Nir Zuk. In 2005, the company was just starting out and had not yet released its first product. The enterprise firewall market was dominated by Check Point (since 1997), Cisco, and Juniper. Palo Alto would not release its revolutionary next-generation firewall until 2007.
